articles.author: Wallace Bell
articles.title: James Gunn Reacts to Peacemaker's Intro Dance Being Recreated At a Talent Show
articles.excerpt: James Gunn reacts to a high-school talent competition that recreates the dance sequence from Peacemaker, claiming that the original was shot in a comparable auditorium.

posts.author: Nick Carver
posts.title: Will Smith Smacking Chris Rock At The Oscars In 2022 Appears To Have Jaden Smith's Support
posts.excerpt: Will Smith struck Chris Rock after the latter's Jada Pinkett Smith joke at the 2022 Oscars, prompting Jaden Smith to express his support for his father.

posts.author: Wallace Bell
posts.title: Oscar Isaac Compares Joining The Marvel Cinematic Universe As Moon Knight To Star Wars And Dune
posts.excerpt: Oscar Isaac compares working on Star Wars and last year's Dune to joining the Marvel Cinematic Universe as Steven Grant in Moon Knight.

posts.author: Kohei Watanabe
posts.title: Barcelona Footballer Pays Tribute To Goku From Dragon Ball Z
posts.excerpt: During a match against Real Madrid, FC Barcelona footballer Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang shows off his Dragon Ball fandom.

posts.author: Nick Carver
posts.title: 'Drive My Car,' an Oscar-nominated film by Ryusuke Hamaguchi, has been added to the Criterion Collection
posts.excerpt: 'Drive My Car' is the first Japanese film to receive an Oscar nomination for Best Picture.

posts.title: The Best Zombie TV Shows That You Should Start Watching
posts.excerpt: There are many TV shows featuring zombies, ranging from dramas to post-apocalyptic thrillers and even comedies, but these are the best ones you should start watching.

posts.title: Director Says Morbius Has Endless Marvel Crossover Possibilities.

posts.title: The Sequel To 'godzilla Vs. Kong' Will Begin Filming In Australia This Year

posts.author: Nick Carver
posts.title: Actor who played Gilgamesh in the Eternals is said to be returning for a new MCU film or show.
posts.excerpt: Don Lee, who played Gilgamesh in the Eternals, is rumored to be reprising his role as Gilgamesh in a secret MCU Phase 4 film or series set to begin production this summer.

posts.title: Gilgamesh from The Eternals, Approves of His MCU Action Figure
posts.excerpt: Don Lee, who plays Gilgamesh in Marvel's The Eternals, is seen approving of Hot Toys' action figurines based on his role.

posts.author: Nick Carver
posts.title: After No Way Home, Marisa Tomei Wants To Reprise Her Role As Aunt May In The Marvel Cinematic Universe
posts.excerpt: Following her sad death in last year's Spider-Man: No Way Home, Marisa Tomei confesses that she would love to reprise her role as Aunt May.

posts.title: Season 2 Of Squid Game Will Have More Games, According To The Creator
posts.excerpt: Squid Game, Netflix's surprise blockbuster, has more lethal activities planned for its players in season 2, according to show creator Hwang Dong-hyuk.

posts.author: Kevin Miles
posts.title: The Oscar-nominated Director Of Drive My Car Doesn't Know How To Drive
posts.excerpt: Despite the film's subject matter, Ryusuke Hamaguchi, the director of Best Picture candidate Drive My Car, has stated that he does not know how to drive.
